text: Congratulations to @GDouglasJones for his great victory.  Congratulations to the people of Alabama for doing what few thought they would do. This is a victory not just for Jones and Democrats.  It is a victory for justice and decency.

Today’s the day: Tell your friends in Alabama to get out and vote! Polls close at 7 p.m. @GDouglasJones will fight for good education, access to health care, and higher wages — we need him in the Senate.

This week, the GOP Senate will vote on Steven Grasz, Donny Willett, & James Ho to sit on the federal courts of appeals. The records of all 3 nominees show that they will favor powerful interests over workers, women, LGBTQ individuals, people of color, & religious minorities.

We need to fight for judges that protect the rights of all Americans, not just the wealthy & the well-connected. That’s why I will be voting against these judicial nominees, & I urge my colleagues to do the same.

Today @POTUS signed the 2018 #NDAA bill, which includes two amendments I offered that would ensure @DeptofDefense assets in #Florida are fully repaired in wake of #HurricaneIrma, and that our cyber force is properly equipped and trained.
